resources.string: I am very passionate about programming since my University life. I love solve programming problems from various online judges. I like graph theory most of all and dynamic programming. As a CSE graduate, I am deeply interested in working with various fields of AI. After finishing graduation, I am seeking for a position in a reputated company where I can utilize my skills.
This is simple pet project named Newsviews. I was given to me as the purpose of recruitment process at Rokomari.com

This is a NewsViews app. A news reading app. This is a pet project, which was given to all the candidate who attended the Rokomari Twenty-20 Android Hunt recruitment process. There is a public api for news reading. We had to fetch data from there. Also design some UI like navigation drawer. There are some plus point in the project. Having great time while developing this app.
